name: TUA-176

steps.name: Authorize user with valid email admin@gmail.com and password admin
Click on dropdown for authorized user in top right corner of header
Click on 'Мій профіль' button in dropdown for authorized users
Click 6 times on upper arrow in 'Від' field
Click 7 times on upper arrow in 'до' field
Enter 9632548777 data into Phone number field of 'Контакти' area
Fill 'Опис' field with Also known as the Mo

parameters.name: arg0
parameters.value: [Also known as the Mo, 1, Also known as the Monastery of the ghfg]

parameterValues: [Also known as the Mo, 1, Also known as the Monastery of the ghfg]
